mint.mvc.renderer

类 TemplateRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mint.mvc.renderer.Renderer
      • mint.mvc.renderer.TemplateRenderer

  • public class TemplateRenderer
extends Renderer
    Render output using template engine.
    作者:
    Michael Liao (askxuefeng@gmail.com), LiangWei(895925636@qq.com)

      • render

        public void render(javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: Renderer
        Render the output of http response.
        指定者:
        render 在类中 Renderer
        参数:
        context - ServletContext object.
        request - HttpServletRequest object.
        response - HttpServletResponse object.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If any Exception occur.
